projects.title: Projects
projects.disclaimer: Note: Most projects are deployed on Render, so they may take a few minutes to wake up.
projects.important_note_body: I am using the Render free tier and services are not running because I exceeded the usage hours limit. It should normalize next month. To test the code, it needs to be hosted locally or contact me to perform the tests.

1.title: Spotify Clone
1.description: A modern, responsive Spotify clone built with React, Node.js and Express. This full-stack application replicates core Spotify features including music playback, search functionality, playlist management, and a sleek user interface.

2.title: Supermarket Demo
2.description: A full-stack e-commerce application built with React and Node.js, featuring a custom API hosted on Render that processes data from DummyJSON. It demonstrates the complete development cycle, from backend routing and external API integration to independent deployment on GitHub Pages.

3.title: Users CRUD
3.description: A full-stack user management system featuring a REST API built with Node.js and a modular Vanilla JS frontend. It implements SOLID principles, real-time multi-language support (i18n), and complete CRUD operations.

4.title: Go Concurrency Booking
4.description: A high-performance backend service built in Go that manages massive concurrent ticket reservations using Redis distributed locking and PostgreSQL optimistic locking. It follows a Hexagonal Architecture to ensure atomic transactions and prevent race conditions in high-traffic environments.

5.title: Little Lemon Restaurant
5.description: The backend API for the Little Lemon Restaurant, built with Django and Django REST Framework. It handles menu management, table bookings, and user authentication. NOTE: AI was used to generate the index containing the API endpoints.

1.title: Clon de Spotify
1.description: Un clon moderno y responsivo de Spotify construido con React, TypeScript y Node.js. Esta aplicación full-stack replica funciones principales como reproducción de música, búsqueda y gestión de listas.

2.title: Supermercado
2.description: Aplicación de e-commerce full-stack desarrollada con React y Node.js, que utiliza una API propia alojada en Render para gestionar datos de DummyJSON. El proyecto destaca la integración de servicios externos y el despliegue independiente de frontend y backend en GitHub Pages

3.title: CRUD de Usuarios
3.description: Un sistema de gestión de usuarios full-stack con una API REST en Node.js y un frontend modular en Vanilla JS. Implementa principios SOLID, soporte multiidioma en tiempo real (i18n) y operaciones CRUD completas

4.title: Reserva concurrente en Go
4.description: Un servicio backend de alto rendimiento desarrollado en Go que gestiona reservas masivas concurrentes mediante bloqueos distribuidos en Redis y bloqueo optimista en PostgreSQL. Implementa una Arquitectura Hexagonal para asegurar transacciones atómicas y prevenir condiciones de carrera en entornos de alto tráfico.

5.title: Little Lemon Restaurant
5.description: La API backend para Little Lemon Restaurant, construida con Django y Django REST Framework. Gestiona la gestión del menú, reservas de mesas y autenticación de usuarios. NOTA: Se utilizó IA para generar el índice que contiene los endpoints de la API.
